title: Drawing, Design for a Round Table on Scrolling Base, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Round Table on Scrolling Base
medium: Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: In pen and black ink, at upper right of design, with an arrow pointing to table top: "Top 4'.0" DIAM"; In graphite, at center right of table: "of"; in graphite, at lower right segment of sheet: "no resettes, /but scroll./other table"
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded table top raised on reeded columnar supports, atop a molded base terminating in scroll-like feet with carved rosettes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Round Table on Scrolling Base, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-124
